entry.title: $2300 // AMAZING 1BR on LES! Spacious, Near MTA, Quick Approval
entry.content:
**Photos are reflect similar unit in this building**


This wonderfully welcoming 1BR home on Henry Street offers all the details you desire to make your dream a reality: a lovely location less than a block from the F Train; exposed brick; plenty of sunlit space to furnish, relax, and entertain; a modern kitchen with attractive appliances for making marvelous meals; deep closets to tidy up your storage; handsome hardwood floors, soaring ceilings, and a brilliant tiled bath for soaking and soothing your stress away!

The delirious demand for Downtown apartments is well justified: this is the heart of New York's high end social scene: a neighborhood girdled by galleries and theaters, serviced by sumptuous feasts of flavors and chic shops with the latest designs for dress or decor, elevated to exclusivity by notorious nightlife, rendered beautiful by concrete corners where lavish lofts lay high above cobblestoned cross streets. Easily accessible by subway, this is the fashionable fantasyland for those who value life as an expression of joy and have earned the right to call themselves part of it.


Contact Xudong @ 646-244-8125 or Damian @ 609-442-9175 for more information and set up viewing!
